Motion Design

Lower Thirds and Transition

This was a broadcast package design where my goal was to create a lower thirds style that fit the asthetic of the video content. My goal was to have the lower thirds be memorable as well as provide information on the upcoming content. Using transitions allowed me to create an interesting look for the lower thirds and have it flow directly into the video preview. In order to switch to the next lower third, I created several vertical bars and used alpha mattes to make it look as if the previous video was wiping away to reveal new content.
